about_the_game:
Story

It was an era in which the world was shaken by an unprecedented collision. As our Earth and a parallel universe Earth reached exactly the same position in the universe, shocking anomalies emerged on both worlds. The anomalies selectively fused the Earths together, not only annihilating entire regions but also significantly decimating life on both sides. The few survivors found themselves in a world permeated by mysterious energies and vibrant crystal beings. Eldoran, as the locals of the parallel world named it, became a magical place that evoked both fascination and terror.

Features

  • Survival
    Discover numerous survivors in the open world. Save and recruit them for your camps. Find food, build shelters, and combat diseases to prevent your survivors from succumbing to death.

  • Base Building
    In the open world, you can establish camps anywhere and expand them from a small refuge to a large compound. Build shelters, crafting stations, and defensive measures. Defend your camps against attacks of all kinds.

  • Farming
    With the right tools, you can reforest trees and cultivate various types of plants and food. Care for your growing plants and harvest them when they are ripe.

  • Crafting
    With a variety of workstations, you can craft new armor, weapons, food, and other useful items.

  • Fishing
    Fishing is not just a means of food procurement in Eldoran but also a hobby. Catch fish and bring them to your own waters to breed.

  • Taming
    Many primitive crystal beings from the Earth of Eldoran can be captured and trained to assist you in the struggle for survival.

  • Conquer the World
    The newly formed world is vibrant and perilous. Enemy tribes in Eldoran evolve thanks to AI and may attack if it benefits them. Ensure that the opponent does not gain the upper hand.

  • Learning by Doing
    All survivors are unique, possessing random skills in your village. Some can acquire additional skills, while others cannot. In everything your survivor does, they become better and more efficient. So, take good care of them!

name: Eldoran
short_description: Explore an open world in Eldoran, build settlements, rescue survivors, discover new technologies, and battle numerous foes. Your adventure awaits in this unique reality born from the merging of two worlds!
